entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 11.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming south 60 gusting to 90 in the afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
